articles.content: By the time I was eight months sober, the version of myself who drank felt like a distant memory. Id think back on her with pity, and a little condescension. Why did I think I needed alcohol to have fun? Id wonder, knowing full well that fun had nothing to do… [+6139 chars]

articles.title: Nursing cancer patients during COVID-19 - NEWS CENTER Maine
articles.description: Nurses at Northern Light Cancer Care are dealing with physical and emotional changes during the coronavirus pandemic to better protect susceptible patients.

articles.author: Anushree Gupta
articles.title: COVID-19 Treatment: Scientists look to a llama for antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 virus - Times Now
articles.description: The researchers chose the llama, as the animal and other animals of the camel family produce standard and smaller antibodies, which help the researchers study them better.
articles.content:
• Researchers have identified a llama, called Winter, to help with antibodies against the novel coronavirus
  • Four years ago, the researchers had given the llama safe amounts of the SARS and MERS viruses
